name: Indonesian Republic
startIntroPart1: Across a vast ocean dotted with over fifteen thousand islands, our nation stands as a beacon of resilience and renewal. Under the iron-fisted rule of Juliono—deemed a tyrant by foreign eyes yet celebrated at home as an independent hero—we cast off the shackles of imperialism and colonial oppression. Our legacy is one of survival, self-determination, and an unyielding commitment.
startIntroPart2: Juliono, you has driven both imperialsm and colonialsim and liberated Indonesia. Will your governance once more bring prosperity to Indonesia after you drove the invader? Will you build a civilization to stand the test of time?
defeated: Today we fall, but our hatred will not perish with us. Though defeated, the embers of our fury remain—and they will ignite a revenge as inevitable as the tide.
declaringWar: Enough talk! We declare war on you, and our wrath will be as relentless as the crashing tide. Prepare to face the fury of our archipelago!
attacked: You dare to strike at our sacred isles! Rally to arms—the time has come to unleash the storm of our vengeance upon these interlopers!
introduction: Welcome, esteemed emissary. Here, in our sprawling archipelago, strength and culture intertwine. Our leader, Juliono, rules with unwavering resolve. While his methods may seem harsh to outsiders, they are the bedrock upon which our freedom was forged. Let us engage not in the transient pursuits of military might, but in the enduring art of cultural exchange
neutralHello: Greetings, traveler. In our vast archipelago, every voice is heard. What brings you to these shores?
hateHello: Why are you here? just spit it out!
tradeRequest: Step into our vibrant markets, where every traded artifact carries a story as rich as the tapestry of our islands. We do not merely exchange goods—we share a heritage steeped in struggle and triumph. May this commerce be as bountiful and harmonious as the endless waves that unite our scattered isles.
